documents.title: Cloudora Employee Training Overview
documents.content: Cloudora provides structured training for Telecalling, Sales, CRM, Marketing, Creative, Development, Support, and Administration. Genie acts as the training assistant, giving scripts, workflows, best practices, assessments, and continuous guidance.

documents.title: Telecalling Training Introduction
documents.content: Telecallers must understand: lead collection, requirement identification, CRM notes, professional communication, objection handling, and disciplined follow-ups. Training includes tone control, voice clarity, active listening, and structured questioning.

documents.title: Telecalling Key Training Points
documents.content: Key telecalling skills: ask structured questions, avoid rushing, collect full details, maintain CRM accuracy, positive tone, stay calm, avoid arguments, handle objections politely, follow daily targets, and complete follow-ups on time.

documents.title: Sales Training Introduction
documents.content: Sales training includes: requirement discovery, value pitching, pricing frameworks, timeline explanation, objection handling, proposal preparation, negotiation within guardrails, and confident closing.

documents.title: Sales Best Practices
documents.content: Best practices: listen before pitching, ask discovery questions, explain benefits clearly, avoid overselling, highlight deliverables, follow-up consistently, create polite urgency, document everything, and maintain transparency.

documents.title: CRM Usage Training
documents.content: Employees must update CRM after every call, change lead status properly, add detailed notes, upload documents, track progress, and ensure follow-up schedules. Genie guides employees on CRM stages and expected actions.

documents.title: Marketing Team Training
documents.content: Marketing training covers: content creation, branding rules, visual style, content calendars, ad creatives, analytics interpretation, and monthly reporting. Team must follow brand tone and scheduled output.

documents.title: Creative Team Training
documents.content: Creative training includes design principles, storytelling, color psychology, typography, motion basics, editing structure, and visual communication. Deadlines, quality consistency, and brief adherence are emphasized.

documents.title: Development Team Training
documents.content: Development training covers coding standards, documentation, Git workflow, deployments, API communication, database management, testing, and security rules. Developers must produce clean, maintainable, optimized code.

documents.title: Support Team Training
documents.content: Support team training includes issue classification, SLA rules, troubleshooting basics, communication etiquette, escalation flow, and ticket documentation. Response must be fast, polite, and aligned with SLA priorities.

documents.title: Productivity & Time Management Training
documents.content: Training includes prioritization, deadline management, reducing delays, clear communication, and maintaining daily task lists. Genie assists employees with reminders, workflows, and structured planning.

documents.title: Employee Onboarding Module
documents.content: New employees learn Cloudora values, services, CRM basics, communication rules, department workflows, training flow, assessment process, and how to use Genie for guidance.

documents.title: Detailed Department Training Modules
documents.content: This contains structured multi-hour training modules for Telecalling, Sales, Technical Development, and Soft Skills.
